field_location_parent.name: location_parent
field_location_parent.label: Does this location have a parent location?

field_location_prepend_the.name: location_prepend_the
field_location_prepend_the.label: Automatically prepend location name with "the" in phrases?
field_location_prepend_the.instructions: Setting this to "Yes" will add the word "the" before the location name in headings such as "About [Location Name]".

field_location_hidden.name: location_hidden
field_location_hidden.label: Exclude from Primary Location List?
field_location_hidden.instructions: Setting this to "Yes" will remove this location from the Location archive. This input will not affect whether the location will be displayed on profiles and search results.

field_location_address_1.name: location_address_1
field_location_address_1.label: Street Address
field_location_address_1.instructions:
Spell out numbered streets nine and under; use figures for 10 and above (e.g., 5 Sixth Ave., 3012 50th St., No. 10 Downing St.).

Use the abbreviations Ave., Blvd. and St. Otherwise, spell out similar words (e.g., Alley, Drive, Road, Terrace).

Always use figures for an address number (e.g., 9 Morningside Circle).

Spell out and capitalize First through Ninth when used as street names; use figures for 10th and above (e.g., 7 Fifth Ave., 100 21st St.).

Abbreviate compass points used to indicate directional ends of a street or quadrants of a city in a numbered address (e.g., 222 E. 42nd St., 562 W. 43rd St., 600 K St. NW). Do not use periods in quadrant abbreviations (e.g., NW, SE).

Use these forms, as appropriate in the context, for highways identified by number: U.S. Highway 67, Arkansas Highway 10, Interstate 630.

When a letter is appended to a number, capitalize it but do not use a hyphen (e.g., U.S. Highway 71B).

field_location_address_2.name: location_address_2
field_location_address_2.label: Address (2)
field_location_address_2.instructions: Deprecated. Move information to Building, Building Floor, Suite fields.

field_location_building.label: Facility
field_location_building.name: location_building
field_location_building.instructions: Select the most specific building or building complex this location is contained within. If it is not a part of a larger facility, select None.

field_location_building_floor.label: Building Floor
field_location_building_floor.name: location_building_floor
field_location_building_floor.instructions: Select the floor of the building where the patient would first check in.

choices.0: Single-Story Building / The Location Is the Building

field_location_suite.label: Suite or other unit
field_location_suite.name: location_suite
field_location_suite.instructions:
Indicate the area where the patient would first check in.

Do not just include the number (Example: enter "Suite 1A" not just "1A.").

Do not include landmarks (don't say "Next to this other thing").

If you are putting the name of another clinic here, this location should instead be set as a child of that location.

field_location_zip.name: location_zip
field_location_zip.label: ZIP Code
field_location_zip.instructions: Find the ZIP+4 Code for an address at https://tools.usps.com/zip-code-lookup.htm?byaddress.

field_location_map.name: location_map
field_location_map.label: GPS Location of the Relevant Building Entrance

field_location_region.name: location_region
field_location_region.label: Arkansas Region
field_location_region.instructions: For information on how the Arkansas regions are defined, visit https://communications.uams.edu/web/kb/location-regions/.

field_location_parking_map.name: location_parking_map
field_location_parking_map.label: GPS Location of the Main Parking Area
field_location_parking_map.instructions:
If the parking area is a parking deck, place the pin on the entrance to the parking deck from the street.

If the parking area is a surface-level parking lot, place the pin in the middle of the parking lot.

field_location_parking.name: location_parking
field_location_parking.label: Parking Instructions
field_location_parking.instructions:
Indicate whether patients will park in a parking deck or surface-level parking.

Indicate which parking lot, parking deck or other area in which patients will park when coming to this location.

Indicate whether or not patients will have to pay for parking.

If there is a parking fee for patients, indicate whether or not this location validates parking.

If patients will be parking in a specific parking deck, indicate the ideal area of the parking deck in which patients should park. If there is a patient drop-off area, also include details about that.

field_location_direction.name: location_direction
field_location_direction.label: Directions From Parking Area
field_location_direction.instructions:
Comprehensively describe the path patients should take when coming from their vehicle — whether at the patient drop-off area or in the parking area — to the entrance or check-in area for the location.

If the parking area is a parking deck, include instructions regarding how to locate the appropriate elevators and stairs in the parking deck, then include the parking deck level to which they should take those elevators or stairs.

field_location_details_tab.label: Description of the Location

field_location_ac_query.name: location_ac_query
field_location_ac_query.label: Is this an Arkansas Children's location?

field_location_appointments_query.name: location_appointments_query
field_location_appointments_query.label: Can a patient schedule an appointment for services rendered at this location?

field_location_phone.name: location_phone
field_location_phone.label: General Information Phone Number
field_location_phone.instructions: The phone number that patients can call for general information related to this location

field_location_clinic_phone_query.label: Is there a separate appointment number for patients?
field_location_clinic_phone_query.name: location_clinic_phone_query

field_location_ac_appointments_query.label: Does this Arkansas Children's location have separate phone numbers for primary care appointments and specialty care appointments?
field_location_ac_appointments_query.name: location_ac_appointments_query

field_location_new_appointments_phone.name: location_new_appointments_phone
field_location_new_appointments_phone.label: Appointments Phone Number
field_location_new_appointments_phone.instructions: For new patients, if separate numbers for new and returning patients

field_location_ac_appointments_primary.name: location_ac_appointments_primary
field_location_ac_appointments_primary.label: Arkansas Children's Primary Care Appointments Phone Number

field_location_ac_appointments_specialty.name: location_ac_appointments_specialty
field_location_ac_appointments_specialty.label: Arkansas Children's Specialty Care Appointments Phone Number

field_location_appointment_phone_query.label: Is there a separate number for returning patients?
field_location_appointment_phone_query.name: location_appointment_phone_query

field_location_return_appointments_phone.name: location_return_appointments_phone
field_location_return_appointments_phone.label: Appointments Phone Number for Returning Patients

field_location_phone_numbers.name: location_phone_numbers
field_location_phone_numbers.label: Additional Phone Numbers
field_location_phone_numbers.instructions: Add any additional phone numbers for this location (e.g., after hours nurse line).

field_location_short_desc.name: location_short_desc
field_location_short_desc.label: Short Description (excerpt)
field_location_short_desc.instructions: Limit of 160 characters. Preferred length is at least 110 characters.

field_location_affiliation.name: location_affiliation
field_location_affiliation.label: Affiliation
field_location_affiliation.instructions: Affiliations with other medical centers or clinics

field_location_prescription_type.label: Which prescription information would you like to include?
field_location_prescription_type.name: location_prescription_type
field_location_prescription_type.instructions: Administrators can change the preset text in Find-a-Doc Settings > Clinical Locations.

choices.pharm: Preset text instructing patients to call their pharmacy
choices.clinic: Preset text instructing patients to call the clinic

field_location_current_prescription_clin.label: Current prescription information instructing patients to call the clinic
field_location_current_prescription_clin.name: location_current_prescription_clinic

field_location_current_prescription_phar.label: Current prescription information instructing patients to call their pharmacy
field_location_current_prescription_phar.name: location_current_prescription_pharm

field_location_appointment.name: location_appointment
field_location_appointment.label: Information on setting up an appointment
field_location_appointment.instructions: This section should ideally not contain headings. But if it does, use Heading 3 and down.

field_location_appointment_bring.name: location_appointment_bring
field_location_appointment_bring.label: What to Bring to Your Appointment
field_location_appointment_bring.instructions:
This section should ideally not contain headings. But if it does ...
If "Information on setting up an appointment" or "What to Expect at Your Appointment" has text, use Heading 4 and down. Otherwise, use Heading 3 and down.

field_location_appointment_expect.name: location_appointment_expect
field_location_appointment_expect.label: What to Expect at Your Appointment
field_location_appointment_expect.instructions:
This section should ideally not contain headings. But if it does ...
If "Information on setting up an appointment" or "What to Bring to Your Appointment" has text, use Heading 4 and down. Otherwise, use Heading 3 and down.

field_link_message.message:
External Website

Include a title and URL for a link to an external non-UAMS website. This is intended for use when the location is a non-UAMS location where our providers practice.

This link should only be used when it is critical to the patient experience (e.g. for becoming a patient, making an appointment, receiving follow-up information). This is not to be used as a link to secondary things like a social media account.

field_location_image_override_parent_fea.name: location_image_override_parent_featured
field_location_image_override_parent_fea.label: Override Parent Featured Image?
field_location_image_override_parent_fea.instructions: To remove the parent featured image, select Yes and leave image blank

field_location_featured_image.label: Featured Image
field_location_featured_image.name: _thumbnail_id
field_location_featured_image.instructions:
Select an image that will be used on card layouts, schema data, social sharing, etc.
You can select an image that is also used as the Wayfinding Photo or in the Photo Gallery.
The photo orientation must be landscape / horizontal.
Minimum dimensions: 1200x675.

field_location_image_override_parent_way.name: location_image_override_parent_wayfinding
field_location_image_override_parent_way.label: Override Parent Wayfinding Photo?
field_location_image_override_parent_way.instructions: To remove the parent wayfinding photo, select Yes and leave photo blank

field_location_wayfinding_photo.label: Wayfinding Photo
field_location_wayfinding_photo.name: location_wayfinding_photo
field_location_wayfinding_photo.instructions:
Select an image that will help the patient find the appropriate building from the road.
The photo orientation must be landscape / horizontal.
Minimum dimensions: 1200x675

field_location_image_override_parent_gal.name: location_image_override_parent_gallery
field_location_image_override_parent_gal.label: Override Parent Photo Gallery?
field_location_image_override_parent_gal.instructions: To remove the parent gallery, select Yes and leave gallery empty

field_location_photo_gallery.label: Photo Gallery
field_location_photo_gallery.name: location_photo_gallery
field_location_photo_gallery.instructions:
You may select up to four images.
These could include a photo of the interior entrance to the clinic or photos of the clinic in use.
The photo orientation must be landscape / horizontal.
Minimum dimensions: 1200x675

sub_fields.label: Hours of Operation
sub_fields.message: Set the time for each day or mark it as open 24/7.

sub_fields.name: location_hours_variable
sub_fields.label: Do the location's hours vary?
sub_fields.instructions: For example, does this location operate only periodically or as needed?

sub_fields.name: location_hours_variable_info
sub_fields.label: Variable Hours Information
sub_fields.instructions: Describe how the hours work for this location.

sub_fields.name: location_hours
sub_fields.label: Typical Hours
sub_fields.instructions: Set the time for all seven days.

sub_fields.name: location_after_hours
sub_fields.label: Information for When the Location Is Closed
sub_fields.instructions: Describe what patients should do if they need assistance when this location is closed.

sub_fields.label: Are there any upcoming modified in-person hours of operation?
sub_fields.name: location_modified_hours

sub_fields.label: Reason for Modified In-Person Hours of Operation
sub_fields.name: location_modified_hours_reason
sub_fields.instructions:
Describe the overall reason the in-person hours of operation are being modified. This might be because of a holiday or public health emergency.

The date range will be displayed automatically, so that does not have to be included in this field.

sub_fields.label: Start Date For the Modified In-Person Hours of Operation
sub_fields.name: location_modified_hours_start_date
sub_fields.instructions: The date when the modified in-person hours of operation begin.

sub_fields.label: Is there an end date for the modified in-person hours of operation?
sub_fields.name: location_modified_hours_end

sub_fields.label: End Date For the Modified In-Person Hours of Operation
sub_fields.name: location_modified_hours_end_date
sub_fields.instructions: The date after which the modified in-person hours of operation end.

sub_fields.label: Individual Modified In-Person Hours of Operation
sub_fields.name: location_modified_hours_group

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: location_modified_hours_title
sub_fields.instructions: Define the text to be used in the heading for this set of modified hours (e.g., "Thanksgiving Holiday Hours").

sub_fields.label: Information
sub_fields.name: location_modified_hours_information
sub_fields.instructions:
This field can include a description of the modification if it is too complex for using the Hours field below. One example of this would be if the telemedicine service was unavailable on one Friday afternoon and the following Monday morning.

Or you can add information in addition to the structured days and hours.

sub_fields.name: location_modified_hours_24_7
sub_fields.label: Is this location available 24/7 during these modified hours?
Modified In-Person Hours of Operation
sub_fields.name: location_modified_hours_times
sub_fields.instructions: Set the time for all seven days.

sub_fields.label: Does this location offer a telemedicine option?
sub_fields.name: location_telemed_query

sub_fields.label: Telemedicine Information
sub_fields.message: The general information included about telemedicine is set in Find-a-Doc Settings > Clinical Locations.

sub_fields.name: location_telemed_patients
sub_fields.label: Telemedicine Patient Type
sub_fields.instructions: Which type of patients can use the telemedicine services offered at this location?

sub_fields.name: location_telemed_24_7
sub_fields.label: Is telemedicine typically available 24/7 at this location?

sub_fields.name: location_telemed_hours
sub_fields.label: Typical Telemedicine Hours of Operation
sub_fields.instructions: Set the time for all seven days.

sub_fields.label: Are there any upcoming modified telemedicine hours of operation?
sub_fields.name: location_telemed_modified_hours_query

sub_fields.label: Reason for Modified Telemedicine Hours of Operation
sub_fields.name: location_telemed_modified_hours_reason
sub_fields.instructions:
Describe the overall reason the hours are being modified. This might be because of a holiday or public health emergency.

This field can also include a description of the modification, if it is too complex for using the Hours field below. One example of this would be if the telemedicine service was unavailable on one Friday afternoon and the following Monday morning.

The date range will be displayed automatically, so that does not have to be included in this field..

sub_fields.label: Start Date For the Modified Telemedicine Hours of Operation
sub_fields.name: location_telemed_modified_hours_start_date
sub_fields.instructions: The date when the modified telemedicine hours of operation begin.

sub_fields.label: Is there an end date for the modified telemedicine hours of operation?
sub_fields.name: location_telemed_modified_hours_end

sub_fields.label: End Date For the Modified Telemedicine Hours of Operation
sub_fields.name: location_telemed_modified_hours_end_date
sub_fields.instructions: The date after which the modified telemedicine hours of operation end.

sub_fields.name: location_telemed_modified_hours_24_7
sub_fields.label: Is telemedicine available 24/7 during these modified telemedicine hours of operation?
Modified Telemedicine Hours of Operation
sub_fields.name: location_telemed_modified_hours_times
sub_fields.instructions: Set the time for all seven days.

field_location_physicians.name: physician_locations
field_location_physicians.label: Providers
field_location_physicians.instructions: The providers will display in alphabetical order. If there is more than one row of providers, the first row will display before prompting the user to load more.

field_location_conditions_treatments_tab.label: Related Conditions and Treatments

field_location_conditions_cpt.name: location_conditions_cpt
field_location_conditions_cpt.label: Conditions
field_location_conditions_cpt.instructions: The conditions will display in alphabetical order.

field_location_treatments_cpt.name: location_treatments_cpt
field_location_treatments_cpt.label: Treatments & Procedures
field_location_treatments_cpt.instructions: The treatments and procedures will display in alphabetical order.

field_location_clinical_resources.name: location_clinical_resources
field_location_clinical_resources.label: Clinical Resources
field_location_clinical_resources.instructions: Resources will be displayed on the page in the order in which they were published, with the most recently published resources showing first.

field_location_scheduling_query.name: location_scheduling_query
field_location_scheduling_query.label: Enable MyChart Scheduling?
field_location_scheduling_query.instructions: Check with the MyChart team before doing anything here.

field_location_scheduling_title_general.name: location_scheduling_title_general
field_location_scheduling_title_general.label: Appointment Section Title (Optional Override)
field_location_scheduling_title_general.instructions:
If there are multiple scheduling widgets, this will define the text used in the main section heading. If you do not define a value here, "Schedule an Appointment Online" will be used.
If you define a value here, use a very short phrase that makes the purpose of the online scheduling section clear to the user. Do not just use the name of a condition or treatment.
If there is only one scheduling widget, the heading will be defined by a value from within the MyChart Open Scheduling Widget(s) repeater instead.

field_location_scheduling_intro_general.name: location_scheduling_intro_general
field_location_scheduling_intro_general.label: Appointment Section Introduction (Optional Override)
field_location_scheduling_intro_general.instructions:
This paragraph introduces the online scheduling section. If you do not define a value here, it will display "Use your UAMS Health MyChart account to schedule an appointment at this clinic. If you are not a MyChart user, you can continue as a guest."
The paragraph should provide brief general information about MyChart open scheduling. There is a 221 character limit.
field_location_scheduling_intro_general.placeholder: Use your UAMS Health MyChart account to schedule an appointment at this clinic. If you are not a MyChart user, you can continue as a guest.

field_location_scheduling_options.name: location_scheduling_options
field_location_scheduling_options.label: MyChart Open Scheduling Widget Option(s)
field_location_scheduling_options.instructions: Define the information for each specific open scheduling widget. One or more must be defined.

sub_fields.name: location_scheduling_title
sub_fields.label: Standalone Heading Text
sub_fields.instructions:
If this is the only scheduling widget, this value will replace the main section heading (defined by Appointment Section Title).
Use a very short phrase that makes the purpose of this specific scheduling widget clear to the user. Do not just use the name of a condition or treatment.

sub_fields.name: location_scheduling_intro
sub_fields.label: Standalone Appointment Section Introduction (Optional Override)
sub_fields.instructions:
If this is the only scheduling widget, you can define a value here to replace the main section introduction (defined by Appointment Section Introduction) if that general introduction does not adequately introduce this specific widget.
If used, this paragraph should provide general information about MyChart open scheduling and a brief overview of anything necessary for users to know about this specific scheduling widget. There is a 221 character limit.

sub_fields.name: location_scheduling_item_title_nested
sub_fields.label: Nested Heading Text
sub_fields.instructions:
If this is one of multiple scheduling widgets, this field defines the text of the heading immediately preceding this specific scheduling widget. This heading will be nested below the main section heading (defined by Appointment Section Title) in the heading outline. This will also set the label of the multiple choice option the user can select to display this specific scheduling widget.
Use a very short phrase, visit type name or treatment name that makes the purpose of this specific scheduling widget clear to the user.

sub_fields.name: location_scheduling_item_intro_nested
sub_fields.label: Nested Appointment Section Introduction (Optional)
sub_fields.instructions: If this is one of multiple scheduling widgets, this field defines the paragraph introducing this specific scheduling widget. If used, this paragraph will not need to cover information addressed in the Appointment Section Introduction field, but should provide a brief overview of any information necessary for users to know about this specific scheduling widget. There is a 221 character limit.

sub_fields.name: location_scheduling_vt
sub_fields.label: Visit Type (PRC) ID from Epic
sub_fields.instructions: A single visit type available for scheduling in this specific widget.

sub_fields.name: location_scheduling_ser
sub_fields.label: Provider (SER) ID from Epic
sub_fields.instructions:
ID for one or more providers available for scheduling in this specific widget. Separate multiple values with a comma (",").
If you specify a department, you can omit the list of provider IDs so all providers who are enabled for open scheduling in that department with that visit type are automatically included in the widget.
Be sure to include an ID for either provider or department (or both). Otherwise, all providers departments with that visit type will be displayed.

sub_fields.name: location_scheduling_dep
sub_fields.label: Department (DEP) ID from Epic
sub_fields.instructions:
ID for one or more departments available for scheduling in this widget. Separate multiple values with a comma (",").
If you specify a provider, you can omit the list of department IDs so all departments who are enabled for open scheduling with that provider and visit type are automatically included in the widget.
Be sure to include an ID for either provider or department (or both). Otherwise, all providers departments with that visit type will be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Fallback Information
sub_fields.name: location_scheduling_fallback
sub_fields.instructions:
This is an optional paragraph that appears after this specific scheduling widget where you can present users an alternative scheduling options. Keep it as brief as possible, limiting it to one to three sentences in a single paragraph. Add tel links to any phone numbers (href="tel:501-555-6162").
Example Paragraph: "If you are unable to register for your appointment using the method above, call 501-555-6162 to schedule an appointment. This line is staffed Monday thru Friday from 10 a.m. – 5:30 p.m. If the lines are busy, you will be prompted to leave a voicemail."

field_location_alert_suppress.label: Suppress alert from Find-a-Doc Settings? (Deprecated)
field_location_alert_suppress.name: location_alert_suppress
field_location_alert_suppress.instructions: Move this value to the Alert Modification field. This field will be removed soon.

field_location_alert_modification.label: Alert Modification
field_location_alert_modification.name: location_alert_modification
field_location_alert_modification.instructions: How do you want to modify the alert from Find-a-Doc Settings?

field_location_alert_body_override_tip.label: Overriding the alert from Find-a-Doc Settings
field_location_alert_body_override_tip.message: If you are overriding the system alert, adding values to the Alert Heading or Alert Body fields will replace the value from Find-a-Doc Settings. Leaving them blank will inherit the values from Find-a-Doc Settings.

field_location_alert_body_prepend_tip.label: Inserting an alert before the alert from Find-a-Doc Settings
field_location_alert_body_prepend_tip.message: If you are inserting content before the system alert, make sure the system alert's body begins with a heading (Heading 2). This way, your alert value here will be separated from the system alert in the heading outline.

field_location_alert_body_append_tip.label: Inserting an alert after the alert from Find-a-Doc Settings
field_location_alert_body_append_tip.message: If you are inserting content after the system alert, make sure the your alert's body begins with a heading (Heading 2). This way, your alert value here will be separated from the system alert in the heading outline.

field_location_gmb_tab.label: Google My Business Details

field_location_gmb_exclude.label: Should this location be excluded from any bulk imports and updates in Google My Business?
field_location_gmb_exclude.name: location_gmb_exclude

field_location_gmb_prefix.label: Should "UAMS Health" be prepended to the location name on the Google My Business listing?
field_location_gmb_prefix.name: location_gmb_prefix

field_location_gmb_cat.label: Google My Business Category
field_location_gmb_cat.name: location_gmb_cat
field_location_gmb_cat.instructions:
Select up to ten categories. Rearrange them so that the first item is the primary category. "Medical Clinic" is a good standard choice, if you cannot find a better option.

For reference, you can view a list of available categories.

field_location_gmb_requires_temperature_.label: Health and safety: Temperature check required (for patients)
field_location_gmb_requires_temperature_.name: requires_temperature_check_customers

field_location_gmb_requires_masks_custom.label: Health and safety: Mask required (for patients)
field_location_gmb_requires_masks_custom.name: requires_masks_customers

field_location_gmb_requires_temperature_.label: Health and safety: Staff get temperature checks
field_location_gmb_requires_temperature_.name: requires_temperature_check_staff

field_location_gmb_requires_masks_staff.label: Health and safety: Staff wear masks
field_location_gmb_requires_masks_staff.name: requires_masks_staff

field_location_gmb_is_sanitizing_between.label: Health and safety: Staff required to disinfect surfaces between visits
field_location_gmb_is_sanitizing_between.name: is_sanitizing_between_customers
